name: OCKChecklistItemButton
desc: A button with an icon and title label.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new checklist item button.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that contains the button’s content, and arranges its children horizontally.

items.name: let label: OCKLabel
items.desc: The label on the leading side of the button.

items.name: let checkmarkButton: OCKCheckmarkButton
items.desc: The checkmark-style button on the trailing end of the view.

items.name: func setSelected(Bool, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the button’s selected state, and optionally animates the change.

items.name: func setStyleForSelectedState(Bool)
items.desc: Sets the style for the button’s selected state.

items.name: func style() -> OCKStyler
items.desc: Returns an object’s custom style, the first parent with a custom style, or the default style.

items.name: func styleChildren()
items.desc: Updates the style of the child views.
